channel.title: Ip ban for no reason?
channel.description:
well guys i am EXTREMELY new to the forums and uhhh yeah :D.
this isnt my first time playing though....
a few months back i used to play this. best server ever. i never thought of returning to runescape ever again....
until one night. was playing with my friend and a mod. i was laughing... having a good time... but the mod said ''he moves and he goes bye bye'' *basicly me* . i thought he was just joking and i ran toward him saying ''bye bye!'' LOLing hard.....
then i dced. i was feeling weird now.
i attempted to log on but guess what.. i was BANNED.
i just stood there for a moment then said to myself....
I WILL JUST MAKE A NEW ACCOUNT AND ASK HIM TO UNBAN IT.
i was wrong. seconds later it came up as a black screen. then it dced me. i was worryed. i tryed to log in back to see that one is banned too! :(
it keeps happening over and over so i just...well.....gave up... :(
i then moved back to runescape.
but every now and then i need both.
anyone...please....un ip ban me....
i realy want to play..... :(

item.title: Ip ban for no reason?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“skullgunner1, post:1, topic:305855”]well guys i am EXTREMELY new to the forums and uhhh yeah :D.

this isnt my first time playing though…

a few months back i used to play this. best server ever. i never thought of returning to runescape ever again…

until one night. was playing with my friend and a mod. i was laughing… having a good time… but the mod said ‘‘he moves and he goes bye bye’’ basicly me . i thought he was just joking and i ran toward him saying ‘‘bye bye!’’ LOLing hard…

then i dced. i was feeling weird now.

i attempted to log on but guess what… i was BANNED.

i just stood there for a moment then said to myself…

I WILL JUST MAKE A NEW ACCOUNT AND ASK HIM TO UNBAN IT.

i was wrong. seconds later it came up as a black screen. then it dced me. i was worryed. i tryed to log in back to see that one is banned too!

it keeps happening over and over so i just…well…gave up…

i then moved back to runescape.

but every now and then i need both.

anyone…please…un ip ban me…

i realy want to play… :([/quote]
This is almost the stupidest post i’ve seen yet… this board is more for server owners and coders that have issues with adding things to there server…
there is absolutely no f-ing point in this post <.<

Read full topic
